safety.title: Your Safety is Our Priority
safety.subtitle: Understanding when and how to use Mediro responsibly
safety.importantText: Mediro is an AI-powered health assistant designed to provide general information and guidance. It is NOT a replacement for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult with qualified healthcare professionals for medical concerns.
whenToUse: Tracking your health conditions over time
whenNotToUse: Chest pain, difficulty breathing, or stroke symptoms
Any condition requiring immediate medical attention
